system.description: Choose one creature type from the following list: aberration, beast, celestial, dragon, fey, fiend, giant, monstrosity, plant, or undead. When you and your allies have felled a creature of this creature type, you may automatically harvest one additional dose of a special material or part of the creature necessary to craft a magic item (no roll required). The item must be crafted as normal. This Esoteric Art may be selected more than once, choosing a different creature type every time.
